features: Complete Skin Care Set for Hydrated & Glowing Skin – The Face Facts Cherry Bliss Bundle includes the Radiance Glow Mist, AHA & BHA Brightening Toner, Niacinamide Illuminating Serum, and Hyaluronic Hydro Cream, delivering a complete skincare routine to keep your skin fresh, hydrated, and glowing.

Gentle on Sensitive Skin – Formulated with skin-friendly ingredients, this bundle is ideal for skin care for teenage girls and adults with sensitive skin, providing hydration and nourishment without irritation.

Deep Hydration & Brightening – The Hyaluronic Hydro Cream locks in moisture, while the AHA & BHA Brightening Toner and Niacinamide Illuminating Serum gently exfoliate and brighten, ensuring your skin stays soft, radiant, and smooth all day long.

Lightweight & Non-Greasy Formula – Each product in this bundle is designed to absorb quickly, providing a lightweight, non-greasy finish, perfect for daily use on all skin types, including combination, oily, or dry skin.

Perfect Gift Set for All Ages – The Face Facts Cherry Bliss Set includes a satin scrunchie, making it a thoughtful gift or an essential addition to any skincare routine, perfect for anyone looking to achieve hydrated and glowing skin.

The Face Facts Cherry Bliss Niacinamide Illuminating Serum, a key part of the Face Facts Cherry set, aims to brighten and even skin tone, while also nourishing and moisturizing the skin with cherry extract and niacinamide
description: Product Description NEW! Face Facts Cherry Bliss Skincare Set Introducing Face Facts Cherry Bliss – Your Glow-Boosting Skincare Routine! This brand-new skincare line is packed with radiance-enhancing ingredients to give your skin a hydrated, bright, and dewy finish . Infused with the power of cherry extract, AHAs, BHAs, niacinamide, and hyaluronic acid , this 4-piece set works together to smooth, illuminate, and refresh your complexion. What's included? Face Facts Cherry Bliss AHA & BHA Brightening Toner – Smooth, Clear & Radiant Skin Gently Exfoliate & Brighten! This powerhouse AHA & BHA toner refines pores, smooths texture, and removes dead skin cells , revealing a brighter, clearer complexion . Infused with cherry extract and exfoliating acids, it helps even skin tone while keeping your skin refreshed and balanced —a must-have for glowing skin! Face Facts Cherry Bliss Radiance Glow Mist – Instant Hydration & Glow Refresh, Hydrate & Glow! This ultra-light, cherry-infused glow mist instantly hydrates, revitalizes, and boosts skin radiance . Packed with antioxidants, it helps protect against environmental stressors , leaving your skin dewy, fresh, and luminous all day long. Perfect for an on-the-go glow! Face Facts Cherry Bliss Niacinamide Illuminating Serum – Even Tone & Radiance Bye-Bye Dark Spots, Hello Glow! Infused with niacinamide and cherry extract , this illuminating serum fades dark spots, evens skin tone, and boosts brightness for a naturally radiant look. Lightweight and fast-absorbing, it controls excess oil and minimizes pores , making it a perfect addition to your skincare routine. Face Facts Cherry Bliss Hyaluronic Hydro Cream – Plump, Hydrate & Lock in Moisture Deep Hydration for a Dewy Glow! This ultra-hydrating hyaluronic acid cream provides intense moisture , plumps the skin, and locks in hydration for all-day softness . With cherry extract and nourishing ingredients, it leaves skin supple, fresh, and radiant —perfect for dry and dull skin in need of a hydration boost!
